Method Detail

OnLoginCallback

void OnLoginCallback(long nUserID,
                     int nStatus,
                     int nResult)
Login call back function.
This function is called after you call ImRequest.login(String, String, int, int).

Parameters:
nUserID - if succeed means user ID, otherwise 0
nStatus -
nResult - 0: succeed, 1: failed

OnLogoutCallback

void OnLogoutCallback(int nUserID)

OnConnectResponseCallback

void OnConnectResponseCallback(int nResult)
When network connection state changed, this function will be called.

When call ImRequest.login(String, String, int, int), this call back will before than OnLoginCallback(long, int, int)

Parameters:
nResult - 301 can't not connect server; 0: succeed

OnUpdateBaseInfoCallback

void OnUpdateBaseInfoCallback(long nUserID,
                              java.lang.String updatexml)
Update user information call back.

When you log in successfully, this function will be called.
another case is when you call ImRequest.getUserBaseInfo(long), this function will be called by JNI.

Parameters:
nUserID - user id
updatexml - TODO add XML example
